billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Provides a credit against tax for the purchase and installation of grab bars
summary: Provides a credit against tax for the purchase and installation of grab bars by a resident owner of real property who is a qualified senior citizen; sets forth a credit schedule; defines qualified senior citizen.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a credit against tax for the purchase and installation of grab bars
